Common Questions Answered

Everything you need to know about our services, processes, and how we can help transform your business.

What services does Eunika Agency specialize in?

We specialize in comprehensive digital solutions including website development, custom software development, mobile app development, NFC card solutions, cybersecurity, SEO/SEM, content marketing, social media marketing, email marketing, virtual assistance, website auditing, and hosting services.

How long does a custom software development project take?

Project timelines vary based on complexity and requirements. Simple applications typically take 8-12 weeks, while enterprise-level custom software may take 16-24 weeks. We provide detailed project timelines and milestones during our initial consultation.

Do you provide cybersecurity services for existing systems?

Yes, we offer comprehensive cybersecurity audits, implementation of security protocols, ongoing monitoring, and protection for both new and existing systems. Our security services include vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, and 24/7 monitoring.

What makes your SEO and digital marketing approach different?

Our approach combines technical SEO expertise with strategic content marketing and data-driven SEM campaigns. We focus on long-term growth through comprehensive keyword research, competitor analysis, and continuous optimization to maximize your ROI.

Can you develop both web and mobile applications?

Absolutely! We develop responsive websites, native mobile apps for iOS and Android, and cross-platform solutions. Our team ensures seamless integration between web and mobile platforms for a unified user experience.

What hosting and server solutions do you provide?

We offer scalable hosting solutions including shared hosting, VPS, dedicated servers, and cloud hosting. Our services include server setup, maintenance, security monitoring, backup management, and 24/7 technical support.

How do NFC card solutions work for businesses?

Our NFC card solutions enable contactless interactions for payments, access control, information sharing, and customer engagement. We provide end-to-end implementation including card design, programming, and integration with your existing systems.

What virtual assistance services do you offer?

Our virtual assistance services include data encoding, administrative support, content management, customer service support, and various back-office operations. We help streamline your operations while you focus on core business activities.
